adrFormatAddress: 580 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: The best eye doctor experience I’ve had in NYC. I have an odd prescription and this was my first time getting contacts, but Suzette was wonderful and beyond patient while we spent months trying to find the right set for me. Thanks to her persistence we were able to find a prescription that works! I’ll never go anywhere else in the city

Thanks to her persistence we were able to find a prescription that works! I’ll never go anywhere else in the city

originalText.text: Sterling is amazing. They resize (sun)glasses for free, and they did a great job. I can whip my head from side to side and these sunglasses don’t go anywhere

text.text: Sterling is amazing. They resize (sun)glasses for free, and they did a great job. I can whip my head from side to side and these sunglasses don’t go anywhere

originalText.text: Great variety and customer service. I took my boyfriend's glasses to get repaired, and it was ready the very next day and affordable cost.

text.text: Great variety and customer service. I took my boyfriend's glasses to get repaired, and it was ready the very next day and affordable cost.

originalText.text:
My first experience at Sterling Optical right before Covid, when I first moved into the neighborhood was fantastic! I couldn’t have a better experience and service. I brought my glasses for repair and it was nicely done by Steve, (I think that is his name) and the lady in the front, very helpful and knowledgeable. They really care for the clientele and it is a personalized customer service. This is my third time, and I’m glad that they are still in business and with the same cordial attitude.
I highly recommend this business as it is for me, one of the little jewels and cherished shops in the UWS.
-MG

originalText.text: I have had only positive experiences with Sterling Optical over the last several years. In particular, Suzette is incredibly helpful and professional. During the pandemic she offered to mail me my contacts. She’s very responsive and is a pleasure to interact with. Highly recommend.
